    国际服冒险岛公告


    Emergency Maintenance - June 11, 2025


    [Updated 11:44 PM PDT] The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items in your inventory for 26 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.

    [Updated 9:25 PM PDT] We anticipate the maintenance to conclude around 1:00 AM PDT June 13 (4:00 AM EDT June 13 / 10:00 AM CEST June 13 / 6:00 PM AEST June 13).

    [Updated 2:45PM PDT] We wanted to let you know that we’re now moving into the testing stage for the fixes! While we can’t share specifics just yet, our team is working hard to make sure everything is functioning properly before we prepare to bring the servers back online. Thank you so so much for your patience as we carefully work through these final important steps.

    For more frequent updates, be sure to join us on our official MapleStory Discord server.

    Hi Maplers,

    We are experiencing an unexpected issue and will be taking our game servers offline for an unscheduled emergency maintenance today. We are actively working hard to resolve the issues as quickly as possible and will provide more updates and information when we can.

    Thank you for your patience and we apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused. We will be temporarily offline by today, June 11 2025 at 11:15 PM PDT (2:15 AM EDT June 12 / 8:15 AM CEST June 12 / 4:15 PM AEST June 11).

    Thank you for your cooperation,

    The MapleStory Team

    • What will be unavailable:
      • All MapleStory game servers.
    • Changes and Updates:
      • For details regarding this emergency maintenance and compensation details, please click HERE
      • Sia Astelle Crash Issue
        • We’ve applied a temporary fix for the issue where Sia Astelle characters would disconnect from the game when starting the 'Lith Harbor Gossip' quest. The map has been adjusted to skip the area that was causing this issue and the quest can now be continued. If your character was stuck before the maintenance, it has been moved out of the map. This issue will be resolved during maintenance on June 18, 2025.
      • Resolved an issue where players could designate Sia as a Hyper Burning MAX character after reaching Lv. 200.
      • Resolved an issue where players were unable to complete the 'Escape from the Academy' quest on Illium characters.
      • Resolved an issue where players were unable to complete the the 'Second Fighting Tactic' quest on Cadena characters.
      • Resolved an issue where players were unable to obtain Intense Power Crystals (Weekly) from some in Heroic Worlds.
      • Resolved an issue where the Hyper Burning MAX 'Start' rewards could be claimed multiple times.
      • Resolved an issue where Sia weapons did not drop from mobs in Interactive Worlds.
      • Resolved an issue where Maltilda sold Hyper Teleport Rocks.
      • Resolved an issue where untranslated text appeared when activating a Shine Stone and hovering over 'Cancel.'
      • Resolved an issue where untranslated text appeared when accepting or declining the '[6th Job] A New Power' quest as Sia.
      • Resolved an issue where text errors appeared in the Erda Link Tutorial cutscene.
      • Resolved an issue where the Lv. 5 Sacred Symbol: Cernium had untranslated text.
      • Resolved an issue where untranslated text appeared when opening the Splish-Splash Spray Set Coupon.
      • Resolved an issue where the "Claim Your Gift!" event guide contained multiple text errors.
      • Resolved an issue where the event guide contained text errors in the 'Rewards can be claimed until' section.
      • Resolved an issue where Shine Boost did not increase the duration by 15 seconds.
      • Resolved an issue where the description for [Focus] Awaken displayed the incorrect duration for Exhaust.
      • Resolved an issue where completing daily quests in the Grandis Region did not grant the 'Grandis Daily Mission Reward' from the Dawn Starlight Gathering event.
      • Resolved an issue affecting the Potion Pot's functionality.
      • Resolved an issue affecting the Demon Slayer Corps medal's functionality.

    v.260 Known Issues


    The Known Issues section focuses on the major issues that have significantly impacted the game and community, and which our team is actively addressing. Please note that while we aim to cover the most impactful issues, this list will not encompass every reported issue. Check back regularly for updates on the status of these issues and information on resolved issues, or any new issues that may have been added.

    Here you’ll find a list of known and resolved issues from the v.260 - Stargazer update:

    Known Issues:

    • Hyperion World Leap
      • Characters world leaping from Kronos to Hyperion would disconnect the player from the game.
    • Item Burning
      • The Item Burning event is not displaying in the Event List UI after the weekly reset.

    Resolved Issues:

    • June 18, 2025
      • Resolved an issue where players with a white custom colorblend eye color would sometimes disconnect from the game when using a Boss Face Coupon.
      • Resolved an issue where the Meso Market in European Interactive Worlds did not function as intended.
        • Any currency that was previously deducted can be claimed the Meso Market similar to how it would appear for a canceled or expired listing.
      • Resolved an issue where assigning Link Skills to a character would sometimes display the incorrect level of the skill.
      • Resolved an issue where players were unable to purchase items from the Victoria Cup event shops. The Victoria Cup Event Shop Period has been extended until June 22, 2025 at 12:59 PM UTC.
      • Resolved an issue causing the Guild Buff to appear behind the "Go to Guild Castle" button, making it difficult to access.
      • Resolved an issue where the bosses Princess No and Ranmaru can be defeated infinitely.
        • Entry to both Princess No and Ranmaru are now accessible.
      • Resolved an issue where players would be missing Legion Artifact levels after transferring from Kronos to Hyperion and using the Legion Leap Box item.
      • Resolved an issue where the Hyperion World Perk Event Notice is not centered after logging in.
      • Resolved an issue where a blank message box appears when trying to buy a Premium Hyper Teleport Rock on Heroic Worlds.
      • Resolved an issue where the Stargazer Damage Skin showed untranslated text in the description.
      • Resolved an issue where Mo Xuan's Challenger's Martial Brace displayed as if it was part of the Challenger Set (Bowman).
      • Resolved an issue where players were unable to complete 'The People's Faith' quest.
      • Resolved an issue causing Sia's pocket not to unlock when reaching Lv. 30 Charm.
      • Resolved an issue where players were unable to access [Ursus] Rumors of the Mighty to face Ursus.
      • Resolved an issue where Mitra's Nodestones and Mirror World Nodestones were not providing their respective skills after use on Sia Characters.
      • Resolved an issue where the Fafnir Celestial Light weapon for Sia characters would have the incorrect potential.
      • Resolved an issue where players were able to enter the 'MNN Broadcast Station Lobby' through the Dimensional Mirror on Challenger - Heroic Worlds.
      • Resolved an issue where players were unable to obtain boss rewards from the Boss Storage when using the Distribution setting in a party.
      • Resolved an issue where there was a chance for a client crash to occur when the Sia skill Savior's Circle buff expired.
      • Resolved an issue where the default color of 'All' chat and 'Buddy' chat would be the same.
      • Resolved an issue where the Regal Wisdom, Royal Banquet Staff, and Fancy Banquet Fan were missing their item descriptions.
      • Resolved an issue where players would soft lock the client when using the Fast Character Switch UI to switch to a character that was pending deletion.
      • Resolved an issue where players were able to use Link Skills and Legion buffs in Challenger-Heroic.
      • Resolved an issue where players were unable to teleport to Heliseum after accepting Alliance Quests on Sia characters.
      • Resolved an issue where players would teleport to different maps despite refusing to accept certain quests on Sia Characters.
      • Resolved an issue where the Royal Face Coupon Voucher and Royal Hair Coupon Voucher would provide the incorrect item after use.
      • Resolved an issue with the display of the Stargazer Server Selection background.
      • Resolved an issue where players were unable to purchase teleport rocks when owning over 2 billion Mesos.
      • Resolved an issue where the Shangri-La icon was displayed incorrectly in the Fast Move UI.
      • Resolved an issue where some Sia characters were unable to complete the [Temple of Time] Memory Keeper quest.
        • If players are still experiencing this issue, we suggest going to the Character Selection screen and logging back in.
      • Resolved an issue where the text of the Kaling boss set 'Kaling's Evil Energy' would display incorrectly.
      • Resolved an issue where the Item Burning event was not displayed in the Event List UI after the weekly reset.
    • June 14, 2025
      • The Gold Guardian Emblem is now available for purchase from the vendor Neville in Henesys Market for Sia characters that have completed their 4th job advancement.
        • We will be adding the Emblem to the general merchant in Oort in an upcoming maintenance as well!
      • Resolved an issue where the Erda Link nodes of Sia Astelle were intermittently being reset.
        • For characters who lost their Origin skill, the skill has been restored to Level 1.
        • We’re continuing to investigate into each case of missing skill levels or node progression and will provide compensation based on each player’s specific situation. We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to get compensation out as soon as we can.
    • June 13, 2025
      • Resolved an issue preventing Sia characters from receiving Emblems if their inventory is full.
      • Resolved an issue where players could designate Sia as a Hyper Burning MAX character after reaching Lv. 200.
      • Resolved an issue causing the client to crash when Sia characters attempt to start the 'Lith Harbor Gossip' quest.
      • Resolved an issue where players were unable to complete the 'Escape from the Academy' quest on Illium characters.
      • Resolved an issue where players were unable to complete the the 'Second Fighting Tactic' quest on Cadena characters.
      • Resolved an issue where players were unable to obtain Intense Power Crystals (Weekly) from some in Heroic Worlds.
      • Resolved an issue where the Hyper Burning MAX 'Start' rewards could be claimed multiple times.
      • Resolved an issue where Sia weapons did not drop from mobs in Interactive Worlds.
      • Resolved an issue where Maltilda sold Hyper Teleport Rocks.
      • Resolved an issue where untranslated text appeared when activating a Shine Stone and hovering over 'Cancel.'
      • Resolved an issue where untranslated text appeared when accepting or declining the '[6th Job] A New Power' quest as Sia.
      • Resolved an issue where text errors appeared in the Erda Link Tutorial cutscene.
      • Resolved an issue where the Lv. 5 Sacred Symbol: Cernium had untranslated text.
      • Resolved an issue where untranslated text appeared when opening the Splish-Splash Spray Set Coupon.
      • Resolved an issue where the "Claim Your Gift!" event guide contained multiple text errors.
      • Resolved an issue where the event guide contained text errors in the 'Rewards can be claimed until' section.
      • Resolved an issue where Shine Boost did not increase the duration by 15 seconds.
      • Resolved an issue where the description for [Focus] Awaken displayed the incorrect duration for Exhaust.
      • Resolved an issue where completing daily quests in the Grandis Region did not grant the 'Grandis Daily Mission Reward' from the Dawn Starlight Gathering event.
      • Resolved an issue affecting the Potion Pot's functionality.
      • Resolved an issue affecting the Demon Slayer Corps medal's functionality.
      • Resolved an issue where the Premium Hyper Teleport Rock UI displayed the incorrect Mesos Balance.
      • Resolved an issue where players using the Magic of Memories Action Damage Skin (Unit) would disconnect from the game.
    • June 11, 2025
      • Resolved an issue where the Memento Coin Shop, Mesos Shop, and Victory Badge Shop within the Morning Star Feast event displayed multiple times for some of the items.
      • Resolved an issue where the Mystical Cubes within the Challenger World Shop were incorrectly priced at 100 Challenger Coins instead of 5 Challenger Coins.
      • Resolved an issue where players were unable to use Magnificent Growth Potions on characters that used the Hyper Burninator.

    Challenger World and Hyper Burning MAX


    The Burning Events are back with a new power boost in Hyper Burning MAX, and we've also got a new set of Seasonal Worlds are here with them, the brand-new Challenger World! Get four bonus levels per level-up with your Hyper Burning characters! Complete limited-time challenges with a fresh character and plenty of power boosts in Challenger World--before you world leap to an Interactive or Heroic World!

    Table of Contents

    • Hyper Burning MAX
    • Tera Blink
    • Item Burning
    • Challenger World
    • Challenger World Leap

    Hyper Burning MAX

    • PDT (UTC -7): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Tuesday, August 26, 2025 4:59 PM
    • CEST (UTC +2): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, August 27, 2025 1:59 AM
    • AEST (UTC +10): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, August 27, 2025 9:59 AM

    Please avoid altering your computer time when participating in this event. Any changes to your computer time clock can cause issues when creating or deleting Burning characters for this event.

    Create a brand-new character during the extra-long event period and select it to have the special "Burning" effect. This event is open to characters in all worlds, as well as Challenger World, except for Sia Astelle characters (Zero characters can participate only after completing Story Quest Act 2).

    After your character reaches Lv. 10, every time that character levels up it will gain an additional four levels all the way up to Lv. 260! You also have the option to designate one of your existing Lv. 200-258 characters as 'Hyper Burning MAX' instead, allowing them to gain that benefit!

    In addition to all this, you'll also earn amazing rewards along the way, including Root Abyss and Fafnir gear! When you reach Lv. 200 on your ‘Burning’ character, don’t stop there but keep on training! You will receive additional rewards on your ‘Hyper Burning MAX’ character at Lv. 200, Lv. 210, and every 5 levels after Lv. 210, up to Lv. 260!

    Requirement: Characters that meet one of the below criteria.

    1. Characters who were newly created during the event period
    2. Existing Lv. 200 - 258 character (For Zero character, one must be Lv. 200 - 258 and must have completed Story Quest Act 2)
    3. Sia Astelle characters cannot participate in Hyper Burning MAX.

    How to Set Up Hyper Burning MAX Character

    • Click ‘Set as Hyper Burning MAX’ to create your Hyper Burning MAX Character.
    • Challenger World UI

    • Interactive and Heroic Worlds UI

    Hyper Burning MAX Character Perks

    • 1+4 Level-up
      • Hyper Burning MAX characters can gain 4 extra levels for each level up from Lv. 10 to 260.
        • Levels from Lv. 1-10 will only increase by 1.
      • Zero characters will level up by 1 before Lv. 200, and can receive 1+4 level up perk after Lv. 200.
    • Level-Up Support rewards are distributed to all Hyper Burning MAX characters
      • You can get all of the following rewards by clicking the START button from the Hyper Burning MAX event UI.
      • NOTE:
        • Zero characters cannot use the Frozen Weapon Box & Frozen Secondary Weapon Box within the Legendary Cryptic Chest, or the 15-Star Fafnir Weapon Box within the 15-Star Root Abyss Set Box (Time-Restricted).
        • For existing characters that already have the Eternal Flame Ring, cannot use the coupon.
    • Reach the level achievements as a Hyper Burning MAX character and obtain rewards!
      • You can get an even more enhanced level achievement reward in Challenger World.
      • When an existing character is set as Hyper Burning MAX, you cannot claim the level rewards for levels you already reached.
        • For example, when a Lv. 235 character is set as Hyper Burning MAX, you cannot claim the level rewards for Levels 200 - 235.

    Level Achievement Support Rewards

    Level Interactive and Heroic Worlds Rewards Challenger Worlds Rewards
    Create Character Mysterious Cryptic Chest: Untradable, expires August 26 at 11:59 PM UTC.

    Open to receive:

    • Snail Pet: Untradable, 30-day duration.

    • Frozen Secondary Weapon: Untradable, Permanent. Req. Lv: 100. Stats will vary based upon your job.

    • Root Abyss Bottom: Untradable, 90-day duration. 15-Star Enhanced, 3 Epic Potential lines. Transfer Hammer and Scissors cannot be applied.
    Fafnir Weapon Box (Time-Restricted): Untradable, 90-day duration.
    Weapon Details: Untradable, 90-day duration. 15-Star Enhanced, 3 Epic Potential lines. Has an Epic Potential. Transfer Hammer and Scissors cannot be applied.

    • The items you get through Burning Boss Accessory Box are permanent and untradable.
    • The Tenebris Expedition Ring and the Awake Ring will be given together with their respective Exclusive Enhancement Scrolls. The given Enhancement Scrolls' duration is 7-days and are untradable.
    • Equipment obtained by using the AbsoLab Weapon/Dominator Pendant Selection Box are permanent and untradable.
    • The items you get when using the Medal of Honor x50 have 30-days duration and are untradable.
    • The items you get when using the Hyper Burning Outfit Coupon are permanent and untradable, 30-day stat duration.
    • The items you get when using the Abyss Hunter Ring Coupon are permanent and are Tradable once within same account and world once.
    • The items you get when using the Infinite Flame Title Coupon are permanent and untradable, 60-day stat duration.

    Tera Blink

    • PDT (UTC -7): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Tuesday, August 26, 2025 4:59 PM
    • CEST (UTC +2): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, August 27, 2025 1:59 AM
    • AEST (UTC +10): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, August 27, 2025 9:59 AM

    Requirement: Newly created characters Lv. 10 and above that have been registered as Hyper Burning MAX characters or new Hyper Burning MAX Zero characters created after June 11, 2025 that completed Story Quest Act 2.

    How to Participate

    • Accept the ‘[Tera Blink] World Inside the Hat’ quest from Event List UI or talk to Spiegelmann located in Henesys or Nameless Town.
    • After completing the ‘[Tera Blink] World Inside the Hat’ quest, speak to Spiegelmann to move to the map.
      • You can stay up to 40 minutes at one time in the event map.
      • You can freely enter and exit the event map by talking to NPC Spiegelmann.
    • All skill and buff effects given through the mission are collected and removed when you exit the event map.

    Tera Blink: World Inside the Hat

    • There are 23 missions within the World Inside the Hat.
    • Clearing each mission gives a large amount of EXP and some will reward items as well.
    • Note: Characters such as Cadena, Ark, and Illium will not be able to earn EXP in the World Inside the Hat if they have not completed their job tutorial quests.

    Tera Blink Rewards

    Completing Spiegelmann's Missions

    • Spiegelmann's Power Elixir x1000: Untradable, Permanent.
    • Dazzling Hat (Pet): Untradable, Permanent, 90-day magic duration.
    • Dazzling Hat's Aura (Pet Equipment): Untradable, Permanent.
    • Spiegelmann's Hat Chair: Tradable within world, Permanent.
    • Spiegelmann's Dazzling Hat Effect: Untradable, Permanent.

    Item Burning

    • PDT/PST (UTC -7/-8): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Tuesday, November 10, 2025 3:59 PM
    • CEST/CET (UTC +2/+1): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, November 11, 2025 12:59 AM
    • AEST/AEDT (UTC +10/+11): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, November 11, 2025 10:59 AM

    Requirement: Lv. 200 and above characters that completed ‘A Greater Power’ or Zero characters that completed Story Quest Act 2.

    Make sure your equipment is just as strong as you are with Item Burning!

    How to Participate

    • Select ‘Get your Item Burning Box’ from the Event List UI and click ‘Participate’ to begin.
    • Receive up to 8 kinds of Challenger Equipment for your character when you use the Item Burning Box.
      • The Item Burning Box is tradable within worlds but the equipment obtained when the box is opened is untradable.
    • After receiving your equipment, you can try the level achievement missions and boss defeat missions!
      • Your progress for these missions can be viewed from the Event List.

    Challenger Equipment

    • Eight (8) types of equipment depending on your job will be distributed.
      • Challenger Weapon
      • Hat
      • Top
      • Bottom
      • Gloves
      • Shoes
      • Cape
      • Shoulder Accessory
    • For Zero characters only, the ‘Apply’ button will appear on the Item Burning UI to apply Lapis/Lazuli Challenger Equipment Set Effect when another equipment Set Effect is applied.
      • If the Lapis/Lazuli Challenger Equipment Set Effect is already applied to the Zero character, the Lapis/Lazuli Challenger Equipment Set application button is deactivated.
      • Bonus Stats for the distributed equipment items are granted as predetermined stats that correspond with each character's Job, and restrictions apply for Item Drop, Sell, Extract, Scroll use, Star Force enhancement, Transfer Hammer, Equipment Transmission, Bonus Stats resetting, and Potential resetting.
      • The distributed Challenger Equipment have the following enhancement/potential applied.
    Stage Level Mission Reward Interactive World Perks Heroic World Perks
    1 200 Defeat Zakum (Chaos) solo Challenger Equipment Perk 1
    • Bonus Stats rank-up
    • Scroll Enhancement value level-up
    • Xenon Armor is replaced and enhanced to All Stats Scroll.
    • Bonus Stats rank-up
    2 210 Defeat Vellum (Chaos) solo Challenger Equipment Perk 2
    • Bonus Stats rank-up
    • Grant Bonus Potential
    • Bonus Stats rank-up
    3 220 Defeat Papulatus (Chaos) solo Challenger Equipment Perk 3
    • Level up to Star Force 17
    • Level up to Star Force 17
    4 225 Defeat Lotus (Normal) solo Challenger Equipment Perk 4
    • Level up rank to Unique Potential
    • Level up rank to Unique Potential
    5 230 Guardian Angel Slime (Normal) solo Challenger Equipment Perk 5
    • Level up to Star Force 18
    • Scroll Enhancement value level-up
    • Level up to Star Force 18
    6 260 Defeat Lucid (Easy) solo Challenger Equipment Perk 6
    • Armor Bonus Potential increase to Epic
    • Weapon Bonus Potential increase to Unique
    • Level up to Star Force 19

    Challenger World

    • PDT (UTC -7): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Tuesday, September 23, 2025 4:59 PM
    • CEST (UTC +2): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, September 24, 2025 1:59 AM
    • AEST (UTC +10): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, September 24, 2025 9:59 AM

    Requirement: New characters created in Challenger World during the event period.

    Challenger World has officially made its way to Global MapleStory! It’s now available in both Interactive AND Heroic Worlds with their usual World perks and restrictions still in effect. Think of it as Burning World but more rewards, faster growth, and now available to everyone!

    How to Participate

    • Choose to play in either Challenger-Heroic or Challenger-Interactive. Both follow the same perks, restrictions, prices, and systems as their respective world counterparts.
      • New accounts created in Challenger-Heroic will not receive the Heroic Gift Box. This reward is exclusive to Kronos and Hyperion Heroic servers.
    • Once a Challenger World is chosen, all characters created there can only be played within that same world. You cannot switch or create characters in the other Challenger World.
      • For example: If your first character was created in Challenger-Heroic, you will still not be able to access Challenger-Interactive even if all characters are deleted. So choose carefully!!!
    • Up to 5 characters can be created in Challenger World.
      • Character Slot Expansion Coupons cannot be used.
    • After the Challenger World event ends, all characters will be automatically moved to the Challenger Leap Zone and the following will be unavailable:
      • Character Growth Items
      • Cash Inventory
      • Auction House
      • Delivery Package Storage

    Challenger World Perks and Rewards

    1. All Challenger World characters receive a special Challenger Skill, which is automatically removed upon World Leap:
      • EXP obtained increased to 1.5x rate.
      • +50 ATT/Magic ATT
      • Normal Enemy Damage +30%
      • Boss Damage +30%
      • Ignore Defense +30%
      • Critical Rate +30%
      • Critical Damage +30%
      • Buff Duration +30%
      • Knockback Resistance +100%
      • All Stats +50
      • Max HP & MP +2500
    2. In the Maple Guide recommended hunting zones for Lv. 259 and below, maps are instanced for each player and up to 10 per map.
      • In Grandis maps, up to 8 players can share the same map.
    3. Upon creation, Challenger characters can claim starter gear by clicking the ‘Claim Creation Reward’ button in the event UI. Each of the 5 Challenger characters can claim the rewards once and deleting a character will not reset the reward limit. Receive the following:
      • Pearl Maple Armor Set Box: Untradable, 7-day duration.
        • Pearl Maple Hat: Untradable, Permanent.
        • Pearl Maple Suit: Untradable, Permanent.
        • Pearl Maple Cape: Untradable, Permanent.
        • Pearl Maple Gum: Untradable, Permanent.
        • Pearl Maple Pendant: Untradable, Permanent.
        • Pearl Maple Buckle: Untradable, Permanent.
      • Power Elixir x1000: Untradable, Permanent.
      • Spell Trace x1000: Tradable, Permanent.
    4. The free gains don’t stop there because you can create up to 3 Tera Burning characters to level from 10-200 and gain 2 levels per level-up! Claim Tera Burning rewards by clicking the ‘Claim Your Tera Burning Gift!’ button in the event UI to receive the following:
      • Mysterious Cryptic Chest: Untradable, 7-day duration.
        • Snail Pet: Untradable, 30-day duration.
      • Lv. 30 Equipment Box: Untradable, expires September 24 at 2:00 PM UTC.
        • Level 30 Equipment: Untradable, Permanent.
      • Legendary Cryptic Chest: Untradable, expires September 24 at 2:00 PM UTC.
        • Frozen Hat: Untradable, Permanent.
        • Frozen Cape: Untradable, Permanent.
        • Frozen Suit: Untradable, Permanent.
        • Frozen Weapon Box: Untradable, 7-day duration.
        • Frozen Secondary Weapon Box: Untradable, 7-day duration.
      • Root Abyss Set Box (Time-Restricted): Untradable, expires September 24 at 2:00 PM UTC.
        • Root Abyss Hat: Untradable, 90-day duration.
        • Root Abyss Top: Untradable, 90-day duration.
        • Root Abyss Bottom: Untradable, 90-day duration.
        • Fafnir Weapon Box (Time-Restricted): : Untradable, 7-day duration.
      • Eternal Flame Title Coupon: Untradable, expires September 24 at 2:00 PM UTC.
        • Eternal Flame: Untradable, Permanent.

    Challenger World Missions

    • Participate in multiple Challenger World Missions by selecting ‘Challenger World’ from the Event List UI and clicking ‘Participate’ to begin.
    • Rewards that are unlocked can be claimed until September 23, 2025 11:59 PM UTC.

    • Hunting Mission
      • Defeat 1,000 enemies near your level (20 levels above and 20 levels below), then click the ‘[Mission Complete]’ button within the Challenger World UI to complete a Hunting Mission and receive 100 Challenger Points and 300 Challenger Coins.
      • The Hunting Mission can be done once a day and up to 5 times a week per account.
      • Missed a daily hunting mission? Use 3,000 Maple Points to complete a missed daily hunting mission.
    • Level Mission
      • Reach specific level milestones with your Challenger World character for Challenger Points and Coins. Open the Challenger World UI to automatically complete the Level Mission.
    Level Reached Challenger Points Given Challenger Coins Given
    260 1000 1000
    265 2000 2000
    270 3000 3000
    275 5000 4000
    280 7000 5000
    • Boss Mission
      • Defeat specific bosses with your Challenger World character for Challenger Points and Coins. Open the Challenger World UI to automatically complete the Boss Mission.
    Defeat Boss Challenger Points Given Challenger Coins Given
    Easy Cygnus 50 50
    Hard Hilla

    Hard Darknell

    Challenger World Tier Rewards

    • The amount of Challenger Points you own determines your Tier. Earn Challenger Points from completing Challenger World Missions to increase your Tier Rank and unlock even more rewards.
    • Reaching the Emerald Tier and above allows characters in the same world outside of Challenger World to also claim the rewards.
      • For example, if playing on Challenger-Interactive, characters in Scania, Bera, Aurora, and Elysium can claim them!
    • Additional rewards can be claimed as you reach higher Challenger Tiers, but the rewards may vary depending on the world where they are claimed.
      • The Ultimate Legion Growth Potion reward displays an additional reward agreement window only in Hyperion and Kronos worlds.
      • If the rewards are claimed in Hyperion, the quantity of Ultimate Legion Growth obtained increases from 10 to 15. When accepted, the reward cannot be claimed in Challenger-Heroic or Kronos.

    Challenger World Shop

    Challenger World Leap

    First World Leap:

    • PDT (UTC -7): Wednesday, August 27, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Tuesday, September 23, 2025 4:59 PM
    • CEST (UTC +2): Wednesday, August 27, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, September 24, 2025 1:59 AM
    • AEST (UTC +10): Wednesday, August 27, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, September 24, 2025 9:59 AM

    Second World Leap:

    • PDT (UTC -7): Wednesday, September 24, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Tuesday, October 16, 2025 4:59 PM
    • CEST (UTC +2): Wednesday, September 24, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, October 17, 2025 1:59 AM
    • AEST (UTC +10): Wednesday, September 24, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, October 17, 2025 9:59 AM

    This challenge is only here for a limited time, but when Challenger World ends your characters have more adventures yet to come!

    Lv. 130+ characters in the Challenger Worlds will be allowed to leap to another world of your choosing during the World Leap period, taking their equipped items, inventory, and mesos with them to join their new communities. When this period begins, all Challenger World characters will be moved to the Challenger Leap Zone map, where they will be able to speak to the NPC Mover to complete their exodus.

    • There will be two Challenger World Leap events for Challenger World characters:
      • 1st Challenger World Leap: August 27 (after maintenance) - September 23 at 11:59 PM UTC
      • 2nd Challenger World Leap: September 24 (after maintenance) - October 16 at 11:59 PM UTC
    • The Challenger World event will end September 23 at 11:59 PM UTC. All characters after this date, will be moved to the leap zone.

    World Leap Details

    • Only characters Lv. 130 and above and up to 5 characters can World Leap.
    • If there are no open character slots, one will be added automatically.
      • If your character slots are full, you cannot World Leap.
    • The following items will not transfer:
      • Items and Mesos in Cash Inventory, Auction House, or Delivery Package
      • Background obtained from coupons, unless extracted through the Mover NPC and transferred when leaping.
    • Characters cannot transfer if:
      • They’re in or requesting to join a guild.
      • They are the Guild Master.
    • Event coins and shared skills will carry over to the destination world.
    • Characters that are not transferred by the World Leap deadline will be deleted.
    • Characters with the following items in their inventory cannot World Leap
      • Mystical Cube
      • Karma Solid Cube
      • Karma Bonus Mystical Cube
      • Karma Star Force 17-Star Enhancement (Lv. 160)
      • Challenger Lv. 4 Special Skill Ring Selector Coupon
      • Challenger Ring of Restraint
      • Challenger Continuous Ring
      • Challenger Weapon Jump S Ring
      • Challenger Weapon Jump D Ring
      • Challenger Weapon Jump I Ring
      • Challenger Weapon Jump L Ring

    Now Available: Sia Astelle!


    A being of the stars has descended into MapleStory, with a new combat style centered on the constellations themselves! Play as our newest character, first seen in MapleStory M, and get bonus rewards from the Wish Upon a Shooting Star Event!

    About Sia Astelle

    When a strange, dark wish interrupts the Star Spirit’s work and the constellations vanish, Sia Astelle, the Star Guardian, journeys into Maple World to discover what threatens her divine work.

    Call upon the power of the 12 constellations and unleash her magic as you adventure throughout MapleStory. Learn more on the Sia Astelle Classes & Jobs page, or take a look at the Introducing Sia Astelle post for more info on how her arsenal of powers have changed from MapleStory M!

    Wish Upon a Shooting Star Event

    • PDT (UTC -7): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Tuesday, August 26, 2025 4:59 PM
    • CEST (UTC +2): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, August 27, 2025 1:59 AM
    • AEST (UTC +10): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, August 27, 2025 9:59 AM

    Requirement: Lv. 20 and above Sia Astelle characters.

    The stars are aligning to guide you forward on your Maple journey. As you follow the path of the shooting stars, you’ll collect wishes that grant powerful rewards!

    How to Participate

    • As Sia Astelle, select ‘Wish Upon a Shooting Star’ from the Event List UI and click ‘Participate’ to start.
      • Alternatively, you can start by accepting the ‘[Wish Upon a Shooting Star] Lead Wish’ quest and talking to Sirius located in Oort.
    • Use the ‘Wish Upon a Shooting Star’ button in the event list to track your event progress at any time!
    • The event UI is split into two sections:
      • Wishes of Progress: Level-based progression rewards
      • Wishes of Style: Fashion and cosmetic rewards.

    Wishes of Progress

    • For Wishes of Progress, you’ll earn rewards as you reach level milestones throughout the event. There are two types of rewards available:
      • Basic Rewards
      • Premium Pass Rewards
    • The Premium Pass can be purchased for 25,000 Maple Points where you can receive additional rewards and special perks:
      • Premium Pass Rewards
      • Access to the Premium Login Event
      • Hunting Perks:
        • +50% Bonus EXP
        • +10% Increased Item Drop Rate
        • Revive in Place Upon Death
      • Note: The Premium Pass can only be purchased once per account. The additional rewards and special perks only apply to the Sia Astelle character that purchased the Premium Pass and are not shared with other characters within the account.
    • Complete specific level milestones within each constellation to unlock additional rewards. There are three constellations to complete:
      • Alchiba
      • Formalhaut
      • Sadalmelik
    Level Basic Reward Quantity Premium Pass Reward Quantity
    Starting Reward

    Premium Login Event

    • Players with the Premium Pass also gain access to the Premium Login Event, which provides rewards based on cumulative total playtime.

    • Playtime begins counting as soon as you start the quest.
    • You can accumulate up to 5 hours of playtime per day.
    Cumulative Time
    (Hours)    		 Reward
    25 Sia Gift Box I: Untradable, 7-day duration.

    Open to receive the following:

    • Fortune Root (Pet): Untradable, 90-day duration.
    • Horoscope Offshoot (Pet Equipment): Untradable, Permanent.
    50 Sia Gift Box II: Untradable, 7-day duration.

    Open to receive the following:

    • Experience Nodestone (x5): Untradable, 7-day duration.
    • Sia Astelle Outfit Selector Coupon: Tradable within the world, 7-day duration.

    Use the coupon to choose one of the following sets:

    • Purple Dream of Stars Outfit Set:
      • Purple Memory of Stars: Untradable, Permanent.
      • Star’s Purple Dream (F): Untradable, Permanent.
      • Purple Star Remnant Shoes: Untradable, Permanent.

    • Pink Dream of Hope Outfit Set:
      • Pink Memory of Stars: Untradable, Permanent.
      • Star’s Pink Dream (F): Untradable, Permanent.
      • Pink Star Remnant Shoes: Untradable, Permanent.
    75 Sia Gift Box III: Untradable, 7-day duration.

    Open to receive the following:

    • Sol Erda Fragment (x50): Untradable, Permanent.
    • Experience Nodestone (x10): Untradable, 7-day duration.
    100 Sia Gift Box IV: Untradable, 7-day duration.

    Open to receive the following:

    • Friend of the Constellations Chair Coupon: Tradable within world, 7-day duration.

    Use to receive:

    • Friend of the Constellations Chair: Tradable within world, Permanent.

    [Update June 11] Cash Shop Update for June 11


    [Update June 11] The Damien Boss Package has been removed from direct sale, and will not be available from the Boss Package Selector Coupons. However, the Damien Hair and Face styles will remain available.

    Philosopher's Book

    • PDT (UTC -7): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, June 25, 2025 12:59 AM
    • CEST (UTC +2): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, June 25, 2025 9:59 AM
    • AEST (UTC +10): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, June 25, 2025 5:59 PM

    Available in all worlds:

    • Philosopher's Book
      • Price (1): 2,600 NX
      • Price (11): 26,000 NX
      • Duration: 90 days

    Note: The Philosopher's Book can be purchased with NX and Maple Points.

    The Philosopher's Book is a special event item that will give you two in-game items when you open it. You will receive two items, one from two separate reward pools. Each Philosopher's Book can only be used once, and contains different selections of items on Interactive and Heroic worlds.

    See all the reward rates for this item here. Rates and possible items differ between Interactive and Heroic Worlds.

    You can receive items such as:

    • Chains of Resentment (90 Days) (Interactive Worlds Only)

    • New Chairs: Flute Snake Chair, Treasure Ship Chair, and Juice Keychain Chair.

    • New Mount: Orchid's Plush Bunny Mount.

    • New Male Wigs: Black Hushy Wig (M), Black Red Carpet Wig (M), Black Flow Wig (M), Black Jerome Wig (M), Black Mint Wig (M), and Black Recover Wig (M)Wig.

    • New Female Wigs: Black School Girl Pigtails Wig (F), Black Spoon of Clear Sky Wig (F), Black Elfine Ponytail Wig (F), Black Lyrha Wig (F), Black Daze Wig (F), and Black Plop Wig (F).

    • New Hair Coupons: Blair Salon Galaxy Hair Coupon (M), Blair Salon Dark Galaxy Hair Coupon (M), Blair Salon Stellar Hair Coupon (F), and Blair Salon Dark Stellar Hair Coupon (F).

    • Lv. 200 Arcane Umbra Equips (Interactive Worlds Only): Shoes, Gloves, Cape, Suit, Shoulder and Hat.
    • Breath of Divinity: Ring. Provides the skill "Dawn Shield" which blocks enemy attacks and gives the player a rechargeable shield. Req. Lv: 150. Trade disabled when equipped. Unique Item. STR/DEX/INT/LUK: +15. MaxHP/MaxMP: +200. Weapon ATT/Magic ATT: +25. Speed: +18. Jump: +10. Number of upgrades available: 1. Can be enhanced up to 25 Star.

    • Flames (Interactive Worlds only): Eternal Rebirth, Powerful Rebirth, and Forever Unrelenting.
    • Special scrolls (Interactive Worlds only) such as Unique Potential Scrolls 80%/100%, Lv. 150/Lv. 160 Star Force 12 Star 100% Enhancement, Lv. 150 100% 15-Star/17-Star Enhancement, X One-Handed Weapon Attack Scroll, X One-Handed Weapon Magic ATT Scroll, X Two-Handed Weapon Attack Scroll, X Two-Handed Weapon Magic ATT Scroll, X Armor Attack Scroll, X Armor Magic ATT Scroll, X Accessory Attack Scroll, X Accessory Magic ATT Scroll, X Pet Equipment Attack Scroll, X Pet Equipment Magic ATT Scroll.
    • And more!

    Heroic World Tick Tock Fairy Petite Luna Pets (Challenger-Heroic World Only)

    • Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, July 16, 2025 (Start of Maintenance)

    The Tick Tock Fairy pets are coming to Challenger-Heroic world for a limited time as the eminently useful Petite Luna pets, which gather up items from great distances thanks to a more powerful Meso Magnet skill! These pets will be usable for 90 days, after which point you can use Petite Luna Waters of Life to restore them for another 30 days.

    Available in Challenger-Heroic world only:

    • Mazurka
      • Price: 99,000 NX
      • Duration: 90 days
    • Cantabile
      • Price: 99,000 NX
      • Duration: 90 days
    • Lil Time
      • Price: 99,000 NX
      • Duration: 90 days

    Boss Outfit Packages

    • PDT (UTC -7): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, June 25, 2025 12:59 AM
    • CEST (UTC +2): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, June 25, 2025 9:59 AM
    • AEST (UTC +10): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, June 25, 2025 5:59 PM

    Get these packages of four Boss Package Selector Coupons with a bonus Boss Title Coupon included within! Both Boss Title coupons have a distinct look and grant a different selection of bonus stats for 30 days.

    Available in all worlds:

    • Boss Package (Blue)
      • Price: 66,000 NX 59,600 NX
      • Includes:
        • Boss Package Selector Coupon x4
          • Each coupon can be redeemed for one of the Boss Packages listed below.
          • Coupon has a 60-day duration, however the resulting items are Permanent.
          • Untradeable.
        • BOSS Title (Blue) Coupon
          • Coupon has a 60-day duration.
          • The resulting "BOSS" title grants the following stats for 30 days:
            • Normal Enemy Damage +30%
            • Bonus EXP +40%
            • Attack Power & Magic ATT +30
          • Untradeable.
    • Boss Package (Red)
      • Price: 66,000 NX 59,600 NX
      • Includes:
        • Boss Package Selector Coupon x4
          • Each coupon can be redeemed for one of the Boss Packages listed below.
          • Coupon has a 60-day duration, however the resulting items are Permanent.
          • Untradeable.
        • BOSS Title (Red) Coupon
          • Coupon has a 60-day duration.
          • The resulting "BOSS" title grants the following stats for 30 days:
            • Boss Damage +30%
            • Ignore Defense +30%
            • Attack Power & Magic ATT +30
          • Untradeable.

    Boss Hair and Face Coupons

    • PDT (UTC -7): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, June 25, 2025 12:59 AM
    • CEST (UTC +2): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, June 25, 2025 9:59 AM
    • AEST (UTC +10): Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, June 25, 2025 5:59 PM

    Available in all worlds:

    • Boss Hair Coupon
      • Price: 3,300 NX
      • Duration: 7 days
    • Boss Face Coupon
      • Price: 3,300 NX
      • Duration: 7 days

    Boss Style Coupons each award a hair or face style selected from the list below, in the same manner as when a Royal Style Coupon is used. Both Hairstyles and Face Styles are identical for male and female characters (including Darknell's beard and Verus Hilla's makeup!).

    Boss Hairstyles available, left to right:

    • Boss Magnus Hair, Boss Arkarium Hair, Boss Dark Cygnus Hair, Boss Damien Hair, and Boss Will Hair;
    • Boss Verus Hilla Hair, Boss Darknell Hair, Boss Black Mage Hair, Boss Seren Hair, and Boss Kaling Hair.

    Boss Face Styles available, left to right:

    • Boss Magnus Face, Boss Arkarium Face, Boss Dark Cygnus Face, Boss Damien Face, and Boss Will Face;
    • Boss Verus Hilla Face, Boss Darknell Face, Boss Black Mage Face, Boss Seren Face, and Boss Kaling Face.

    See all the reward rates for this item here.

    Wisp's Wondrous Wonderberry (Challenger-Interactive World Only)

    • Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, July 16, 2025 (Start of Maintenance)

    Available in Challenger-Interactive world only:

    • Wisp's Wondrous Wonderberry
      • Price (1): 4,000 NX
      • Price (11): 40,000 NX
      • Duration: 90 days

    See all the rewards rates for this item here.

    Open Wisp's Wondrous Wonderberry (available exclusively for this run in Challenger-Interactive world only) to obtain one random 90-day pet or some pet-related consumables! Take home the Somi 'n Sae, Mung 'n Moon, and Nyan 'n Kham pets and summon them to obtain the Animal Friends Hype Squad skill, which will increase your Weapon Attack and Magic Attack.

    You can also receive the Ruby Snail, Emld. Snail, Diam Snail, Happy Flower, and Balloon Dog pets! Summon the Ruby Snail, Emld Snail, and Diam Snail pets to obtain the Jewel Snail's Mysterious Power skill, which will increase your Weapon Attack and Magic Attack.

    You can also get a stack of 10 Organic Wondercookies or Concentrated Premium Water of Life!

    Luna Crystal (Challenger-Interactive World Only)

    • Wednesday, June 11, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, July 16, 2025 (Start of Maintenance)

    Available in Challenger-Interactive world only:

    • Luna Crystal
      • Price (1): 3,900 NX
      • Duration: Permanent

    See all the rewards rates for this item here.

    Use the Luna Crystal (available exclusively for this run in Challenger-Interactive world only) on a pair of Wonderberry pets to create a stronger buddy to help you out! By combining pets you get from Wisp's Wondrous Wonderberry or the Luna Crystal, you can get higher quality and more powerful 90-day pets!

    Use two Wonder Black pets, which can be obtained from Wisp's Wondrous Wonderberry, and receive either:

    • A Sweet Luna quality Somi 'n Sae, Mung 'n Moon, Nyan 'n Kham, Winter Deer, Snow Ram, Winter Snow, Power XO Bun, Super XO Bun, and Magic XO Bun 90-day pet.
    • A chance at a Petite Luna quality Florian, Florence, and Lil Flora 90-day pet.
    • Or the permanent Luna Crystal Key Pet Equipment, which can be used by any of the Petite Luna pets and give the appearance of their normal Pet Equipment!

    You can also combine a Wonder Black and Sweet Luna pet together and receive either:

    • A Dream Luna quality Somi 'n Sae, Mung 'n Moon, Nyan 'n Kham, Winter Deer, Snow Ram, Winter Snow, Power XO Bun, Super XO Bun, and Magic XO Bun 90-day pet.
    • Better chances at a Petite Luna quality Florian, Florence, and Lil Flora 90-day pet.
    • Or the permanent Luna Crystal Key Pet Equipment!

    Note: The Winter Snowy pet currently has the incorrect in-game name of "Winter Snow" pet. This will be corrected soon in an upcoming update.

    Different quality pets grant different stat boosting skills when equipped as a set, instead of their normal pet set sklls:

    • Sweet Luna (Sweet Luna Skill): 1 pet grants Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +6. 2 pets grants Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +14. 3 pets grants Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +24.
    • Dream Luna (Dream Luna Skill): 1 pet grants Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +7. 2 pets grants Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +16. 3 pets grants Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +27.
    • Petite Luna (Butterfly Garden Skill): Comes with a Meso Magnet skill with a larger area of effect than normal. 1 pet grants Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +8. 2 pets grants Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +18. 3 pets grants Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +36 and increased item pickup range.

    Gachapon Update

    • PDT (UTC -7): Wednesday, June 4, 2025 11:30 AM - Wednesday, July 9, 2025 11:29 AM
    • CEST (UTC +2): Wednesday, June 4, 2025 8:30 PM - Wednesday, July 9, 2025 8:29 PM
    • AEST (UTC +10): Thursday, June 5, 2025 4:30 AM - Thursday, July 10, 2025 4:29 AM

    Available in all worlds:

    • Gachapon Ticket
      • Price (1): 1,000 NX
      • Price (11): 10,000 NX
      • Duration: 90 days

    Note: Gachapon update may take around 10 minutes before or after the scheduled rotation at 11:30 AM PDT / 8:30 PM CEST / 4:30 AM AEST. Please refrain from using your Gachapon ticket during this time to ensure you receive items from the new rotation.

    Gachapon Tickets can give you a number of items, including chairs, mounts, damage skins, and other items. There are also unique items you can only get depending on if you're in a Heroic or an Interactive world. Look below to see some of the items currently available from the Gachapon Ticket.

    See all the reward rates for this item here.

    Fria: Dream Stella, Stellar Dream Collector (M), Dreamland Socks, Dreamy Milky Way, and Dreaming Star.
    Blindi: Dream Crescent, Crescent Dream Collector (F), Starland Socks, Dreamy Milky Way, and Dreaming Star.

    Svenn: Sweet Dream Fragment, Night Sky Suit, Fantasy Shoes, Big Fairy Wings, Summer Jewel, and Midsummer Lily of the Valley.

    Sali: Bouncy Checkered Headband, Rolling Oasis Explorer Outfit (F), Rolling-Along Explorer Shoes, White Hare Expedition Backpack, and Oasis Seeker's Rod.


    Lani: Chic Headphones, Chic Trendsetter Set (F), Chic Denim Wide Pants, Chic White Sneakers, Chic White Backpack, and Chic Pink Smartphone.
    Clive: Chic Headphones, Chic Trendsetter Top (M), Chic Black Wide Pants, Chic Black Sneakers, Chic Black Backpack, and Chic White Smartphone.

    See all the reward rates for this item here.

    In Interactive worlds, you can trade these style box items with other players through the Cash Item Trade window, if you haven't equipped them. Right-click on a character to see the menu and click on 'Trade Cash Item' button to trade unequipped PSSB items.

    You can also exchange them with Ari, located near the Free Market entrance, and receive a Style Box Stamp. You can receive one stamp per item. This stamp is permanent and untradeable. When you collect enough stamps, you can talk to Shiro, also located near the Free Market entrance, to exchange the stamps for a permanent equip item of your choice! PSSB items obtained in the Netherlands cannot be traded outside of the account, but can be traded within the account and be exchanged for Style Box Stamps.

    [Updated 6/11] v.260 - Stargazer Patch Notes


    Get ready to Wish Upon a Shooting Star, because Sia Astelle has descended from the mystical land of Oort! With the power of the Erda Link, she’s not just swinging from the chandelier, she’s swinging all the way down to Maple World bringing the constellations to life! Start your journey with Hyper Burning MAX and level up faster than ever, then dance with the stars at the Morning Star Banquet. When you're ready for the ultimate challenge, step into Challenger World, where the only limit is how you choose to align your stars. The universe is yours to shape, how will you Shine?

    NEW CONTENT

    New Job: Sia Astelle

    Sia Astelle, the Star Guardian of the constellations has descended from Oort into Maple World! Her mission is to gather the scattered constellations and restore cosmic harmony. Play as Sia Astelle now and embark on her celestial adventures!

    Quick Overview

    Class Shine
    Job Magician
    Primary Stat INT
    Secondary Stat LUK
    Legion Bonus Abnormal Status Damage
    (+1% / +2% / +3% / +5% / +6%)
    Primary Weapon Celestial Light
    Secondary Weapon Compass
    Link Skill
    Tree of Stars
    Passive
    Mastery Level: 3
    Buff Duration: +10%, Critical Damage: +3%

    Sia Astelle Equipment

    Primary Weapon: Celestial Light

    Image Item Required Level
    		Stardust Celestial Light 1
    		Shining Celestial Light 10
    		Starry Celestial Light 30
    		Ignited Celestial Light 50

    		Stellar Celestial Light 80
    		Bright Celestial Light 90
    		Lightning Celestial Light 100

    		Dragon Celestial Light 110

    		Eligos Bloody Celestial Light 130

    The Star Guardian
    		 Lv. 10

    		 Lv. 60
    Officer of the Oort Cloud

    Guide of the Stars
    		 Lv. 200

    Sia Astelle Skills

    Sia Astelle is a Job focused focused on executing skill combos to unleash the power of the constellations themselves. She also has a variety of buffs and passive abilities to support her damage and survivability. Her gameplay focuses on using her Marking skills to build combos that trigger powerful Constellation skills.

    • Marking Skills
      When these types of skills are used, they will automatically get recorded on the Stellagram. You can record up to 4 Marking skills at a time.
    • Constellation Skills
      These skills activate based on the combo of the Marking skills recorded. The combo you use will determine which Constellation skills you unleash!

    Beginner Skills

    Skill Description
    Return to Oort
    Active
    		 Returns you to Oort.
    Starry Wave
    Active
    		 Descend slowly by gliding upon starlight.
    Stellar Equalize
    Buff
    		 Increases the Attack Power and Magic ATT of all nearby characters.
    Stellar Marking
    Buff
    		 Activate Stellar Marking to record skills on the Stellagram and fuse Constellations based on the recorded skill combinations.

    1st Job Skills

    Skill Description
    Ray
    Marking
    		 Fires a lance of starlight in front of you and records Ray on the Stellagram.
    Stellar I - Antares
    Constellation
    		 Complete the Antares fusion to summon one of Antares' rabbit holes where it periodically pulls in nearby enemies and deals continuous damage.
    Starlight
    Active
    		 When Starlight is toggled, an additional attack is made upon attacking or when a Constellation Skill is activated.
    Starry Flow
    Active
    		 Teleport a set distance to other locations on the same map using the arrow keys.
    Starry Leap
    Active
    		 Allows you to jump a greater distance into the air.
    Astral Magic Guard
    Passive
    		 Decrease damage taken and transfer some damage received. Permanently increases defense.
    Astral Movement
    Passive
    		 Permanently increases Magic ATT, Speed, Max Speed, and Jump.

    2nd Job Skills

    Skill Description
    Boom
    Marking
    		 Explodes with starlight and records Boom on the Stellagram.
    Stellar II - Algol
    Constellation
    		 Complete the Algol fusion to summon Algol as a lizard where it tracks and charges towards nearby enemies within a set area.
    Celestial Alignment
    Buff
    		 Temporarily increases Critical Damage.
    Oort Wave
    Passive
    		 Permanently increases INT, Damage, and Attack Speed.
    Astral Force
    Passive
    		 Permanently increases Magic Mastery, Magic ATT, INT, and Attack Speed.
    Astral Energy
    Passive
    		 Permanently increases Max MP and absorbs the enemy’s MP when attacking with Magic skills.
    Starlight Enhancement I
    Upgraded Passive
    		 Bolster the power of the Star Guardian to summon greater starlight and enhance the Starlight Damage.

    3rd Job Skills

    Skill Description
    Pole
    Marking
    		 Summons a tower of starlight dealing damage over time to nearby enemies and records Pole on the Stellagram.
    Stellar III - Alchiba
    Constellation
    		 Complete the Alchiba fusion to temporarily gain the Witch’s Protection buff, increasing Ignore Defense.
    Stellar IV - Bellatrix
    Constellation
    		 Complete the Bellatrix fusion to temporarily gain the Bellatrix buff, activating Starlight Link at your location at set intervals.
    Stellar V - Fomalhaut
    Constellation
    		 Complete the Fomalhaut fusion to summon Fomalhaut as a horned conch where it spins around you and damages nearby enemies for a set amount of time.
    Starry Boost
    Active
    		 When Starry Boost is toggled, the maneuverability and distance of starlight increases.
    Astral Elements
    Passive
    		 Permanently Increases Magic ATT, Critical Rate, Critical Damage.
    Astral Invincibility
    Passive
    		 Permanently increases Knockback Resistance, Status Resistance, and Elemental Resistance.
    Stellar Enhancement I
    Upgraded Passive
    		 Strengthens your connection to the stars and increases the intensity of the starlight you can summon.
    Starlight Enhancement II
    Upgraded Passive
    		 Bolster the power of the Star Guardian to summon greater starlight and enhance the Starlight Damage.

    4th Job Skills

    Skill Description
    Link
    Marking
    		 Lights up the sky with refractive starlight and records Link on the Stellagram.
    Stellar VI - Izar
    Constellation
    		 Complete the Izar fusion to summon 3 blades that orbit around you, dealing damage and tracking nearby enemies for a set duration.
    Stellar VII - Vega
    Constellation
    		 Complete the Vega fusion to summon a Starlit Gust, dealing damage to nearby enemies and grants the Starlight Wings buff. When the Starlight Wings buff is active, enemies around you will be attacked periodically.
    Stellar VIII - Sadalmelik
    Buff
    		 Complete the Sadalmelik fusion to temporarily gain the Sadalmelik buff, granting invincibility and decreasing the damage taken.
    Appear
    Buff
    		 Increase the Final Damage for a set amount of time.
    Pulse
    Buff
    		 Hones your resolve to ignore certain abnormal status effects.
    Maple Warrior
    Passive
    		 The Goddess of Maple World’s grace increases your stats.
    Astral Assimilation
    Passive
    		 Permanently increases Magic Mastery, Magic ATT, Critical Rate, and Critical Damage.
    Astral Infinity
    Passive
    		 Permanently increases Damage, Boss Damage, and Knockback Resistance.
    Empowered Ray
    Upgraded Passive
    		 Fires a lance of starlight in front of you and records Ray on the Stellagram.
    Enhanced Boom
    Upgraded Passive
    		 Explodes with starlight and records Boom on the Stellagram.
    Stellar Enhancement II
    Upgraded Passive
    		 Strengthens your connection to the stars and increases the intensity of the starlight you can summon.
    Starlight Enhancement III
    Upgraded Passive
    		 Bolster the power of the Star Guardian to summon greater starlight and enhance the Starlight Damage.

    Hyper Skills

    Passive Skills

    Skill Description
    Marking - Reinforce
    Passive
    		 Increases the damage of Marking Skills.
    Marking - Extra Strike
    Passive
    		 Increase the number of attacks for Marking Skills.
    Marking - Persist
    Passive
    		 Increases the duration of Pole and HP recovery of Link.
    Stellar Marking - Enhance
    Passive
    		 Activates an additional Starlight Link when a Constellation Skill is activated.
    Stellar Marking - Reinforce Duration
    Passive
    		 Increases the damage of Constellation Skills.
    Stellar - Harden
    Passive
    		 Imbues your body with celestial starlight, permanently reducing damage taken.
    Appear - Enhance
    Passive
    		 Increases the Final Damage of Appear.
    Appear - Persist
    Passive
    		 Permanently increases Appear’s buff duration.
    Appear - Cooldown Cutter
    Passive
    		 Decreases the cooldown of Appear.

    Active Skills

    Skill Description
    Stellar IX - Canopus
    Constellation
    		 Complete the Canopus fusion to temporarily summon Canopus as an anchor, dealing continuous damage to nearby enemies.
    Stellar X - Capella
    Constellation
    		 Complete the Capella fusion to temporarily receive the Light of Capella buff, increasing Critical Damage and Critical Rate.
    Observe
    Buff
    		 Borrows power by watching the stars to increase Damage for a period of time.

    5th Job Skills (V Matrix)

    Sia Astelle 5th Job Skills

    Skill Description
    Shine
    Marking
    		 Lights up the sky with refractive starlight and records Shine on the Stellagram.
    Stellar XI - Sirius
    Constellation
    		 Complete the Sirius fusion to summon Sirius as a wolf, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
    Stellar XII - Sadalsuud
    Constellation
    		 Complete the Sadalsuud fusion to temporarily summon Sadalsuud as an hourglass then explodes with great force.
    Time Binder
    Active
    		 Bind the flow of time, immobilizing enemies within range.
    Savior’s Circle
    Buff
    		 Combines the power of the twelve constellations to create a strength greater than any star alone.

    Sia Astelle Boost Nodes

    Skill Description
    Ray
    Upgraded Passive
    		 Boosts Ray.
    Boom
    Upgraded Passive
    		 Boosts Boom.
    Pole
    Upgraded Passive
    		 Boosts Pole.
    Starlight
    Upgraded Passive
    		 Boosts Starlight.
    Stellar I - Antares
    Upgraded Passive
    		 Boosts Stellar I - Antares.
    Stellar II - Algol
    Upgraded Passive
    		 Boosts Stellar II - Algol.
    Stellar V - Fomalhaut
    Upgraded Passive
    		 Boosts Stellar V - Fomalhaut.
    Stellar VI - Izar
    Upgraded Passive
    		 Boosts Stellar VI - Izar.
    Stellar VII - Vega
    Upgraded Passive
    		 Boosts Stellar VII - Vega.
    Stellar IX - Canopus
    Upgraded Passive
    		 Boosts Stellar IX - Canopus.

    Common 5th Job Skill Nodes

    Skill Description
    Rope Lift
    Active
    		 Fires a grappling hook to a platform above you to ascend quickly.
    Decent Mystic Door
    Active
    		 Creates a portal to the closest town.
    Decent Sharp Eyes
    Active
    		 Locates an enemy’s weak spot to deal lethal damage.
    Decent Hyper Body
    Active
    		 Increases Max HP and Max MP.
    Decent Combat Orders
    Active
    		 Temporarily increases all of your skill levels.
    Decent Advanced Blessings
    Active
    		 Increase ATT, Magic ATT, Defense, Max HP, and Max MP. Only the highest effect from Bless, Advanced Blessing, or Decent Advanced Blessing will be applied.
    Decent Speed Infusion
    Active
    		 Increase your attack speed by 1. Only the highest effect from either Speed Infusion or Decent Speed Infusion will be applied.
    Blink
    Active
    		 Teleports you to a random location on the map.
    Erda Nova
    Active
    		 Gather Erda from yourself and your surroundings to explode enemies. Disrupts the Erda of your targets, binding their movements.
    Will of Erda
    Active
    		 Hones your resolve to ignore certain abnormal status effects.
    Decent Holy Symbol
    Active
    		 Temporarily gain extra EXP and items when hunting monsters. Does not stack with Holy Symbol.
    Erda Shower
    Active
    		 Fires a blast of compressed Erdas at nearby enemies.
    Maple World Goddess’s Blessing
    Active
    		 The Maple World Goddess’s Blessing increases all stats and damage.
    Decent Holy Fountain
    Active
    		 Summon a Holy Fountain that restores party members’ HP.
    Mana Overload
    Active
    		 Increases your attack skills by overloading the mana flowing through you.
    Ethereal Form
    Active
    		 Moves you to a different dimension to reduce the damage you take.

    6th Job Skills (Erda Link)

    Skill Description
    Celestial Design
    Active

    Erda Link

    Erda Link is a new system introduced with the 6th Job Advancement for Sia Astelle. This system enhances character progression through a Runestone Node tree, where activating and enhancing stones boosts stats, empowers existing skills, and unlocks powerful new ones.

    Erda Link UI Overview

    • To access the Erda Link UI, open the Skill UI, select the 6th Job Skill Tab, then click the ‘Erda Link’ button. The UI includes:
      • A Runestone Node tree where stones can be activated and enhanced.
      • A section displaying SHINE Stones.
      • A list of currently owned Sol Erda and Sol Erda Fragments
      • A preview panel showing detailed information about the selected stone.
      • A toggle button to view Light Power.
      • A button to access the Sol Erda Conversion UI.
    • All stats gained through Erda Link can be viewed by clicking the ‘See Stats’ button.

    Types of Stones

    • Stones are activated and enhanced using Sol Erda and Sol Erda Fragments.
    • There are five main types of Stones within the Erda Link Stone tree that can be activated:
      • Origin Stone
        • After completing the 6th Job Advancement, the Origin Stone is automatically activated.
        • Can be enhanced up to Level 30.
        • Unlock additional effects at Levels 10, 20, and 30.
      • Ultimate Stone
        • Enhances 4th Job and lower skills.
        • Can be enhanced up to Level 30.
        • Requires the boosted skill in the V Matrix to be Lv. 40 to unlock the Ultimate Stone. Enhanced slots do not count toward this requirement.
        • Requires Light Power to be activated.
      • Skill Stone
        • Enhances 5th Job skills.
        • Activate Common Skills through Skill Stones, such as Sol Janus.
        • Can be enhanced up to Level 30 through one of the following methods:
          • Enhance twice by 15 levels.
          • Enhance directly to Level 30 at once.
        • Requires the 5th Job Skill Node to be Lv. 25 to unlock the Skill Stone. Enhanced slots do not count toward this requirement.
        • Requires all connected Rush Stones to be activated before it becomes available.
      • Boost Stone
        • Grants bonus effects when specific activation conditions are met.
        • Cannot be enhanced.
        • Require Light Power to be activated.
      • Rush Stone
        • Provides bonus stats.
        • Cannot be enhanced.
        • Becomes available when the previous connected stone is activated.
    • Stones that do not meet activation or enhancement requirements will have the Activate Stone or Enhance Stone button disabled, with a tooltip explaining the unlock conditions when hovered over.
    • Stones that meet the requirements will glow and the corresponding button will be enabled.
    • Activating a stone unlocks new paths, and connected branches will light up.

    Light Power

    • Light Power is required to activate certain standalone stones such as Boost Stones and Ultimate Stones.
    • Light Power expands with each activation, except in cases where stones require multiple connected activations and conditions to unlock.
    • Click the ‘Light Power’ toggle to display the current range of Light Power.
    • When Light Power overlaps with a stone that can be activated, a message will appear:

    SHINE Stone

    • SHINE stones are special stones that provide additional stats and can be enhanced up to Level 20.
    • Starting at Level 11, enhancements may fail and can cause the stone’s level to decrease.
    • SHINE Stones are activated and enhanced using Sol Erda, Sol Erda Fragments, and mesos.
    • Each SHINE Stone has specific activation requirements that must be met before it can be activated:
    SHINE Stone Activation Requirement Stats Enhanced
    1 Activate 1 Ultimate Stone Main Stat
    Boss Damage
    2 Activate 2 Skill Stones Magic Attack
    Ignored Enemy Defense
    3 Activate 2 Boost Stones
    Reach Lv. 270    		 Damage
    Critical Damage
    4 SHINE Stone Enhancement Lv. 10+ Main Stat
    Boss Damage
    5 Coming soon in a future update!
    6 Coming soon in a future update!

    Back to Top

    Wish Upon a Shooting Star

    June 11 (after maintenance) - August 26 at 11:59 PM UTC

    Requirement: Lv. 20 and above Sia Astelle characters.

    The stars are aligning to guide you forward on your Maple journey. As you follow the path of the shooting stars, you’ll collect wishes that grant powerful rewards!

    How to Participate

    • As Sia Astelle, select ‘Wish Upon a Shooting Star’ from the Event List UI and click ‘Participate’ to start.
      • Alternatively, you can start by accepting the ‘[Wish Upon a Shooting Star] Lead Wish’ quest and talking to Sirius located in Oort.
    • Use the ‘Wish Upon a Shooting Star’ button in the event list to track your event progress at any time!
    • The event UI is split into two sections:
      • Wishes of Progress: Level-based progression rewards
      • Wishes of Style: Fashion and cosmetic rewards.

    Wishes of Progress

    • For Wishes of Progress, you’ll earn rewards as you reach level milestones throughout the event. There are two types of rewards available:
      • Basic Rewards
      • Premium Pass Rewards
    • The Premium Pass can be purchased for 25,000 Maple Points where you can receive additional rewards and special perks:
      • Premium Pass Rewards
      • Access to the Premium Login Event
      • Hunting Perks:
        • +50% Bonus EXP
        • +10% Increased Item Drop Rate
        • Revive in Place Upon Death
      • Note: The Premium Pass can only be purchased once per account. The additional rewards and special perks only apply to the Sia Astelle character that purchased the Premium Pass and are not shared with other characters within the account.
    • Complete specific level milestones within each constellation to unlock additional rewards. There are three constellations to complete:
      • Alchiba
      • Formalhaut
      • Sadalmelik
    Level Basic Reward Quantity Premium Pass Reward Quantity
    Starting Reward

    Premium Login Event

    • Players with the Premium Pass also gain access to the Premium Login Event, which provides rewards based on cumulative total playtime.

    • Playtime begins counting as soon as you start the quest.
    • You can accumulate up to 5 hours of playtime per day.
    Cumulative Time
    (Hours)    		 Reward
